name: Instabug Android Sample
tagline: An in-depth journey depicting all the ways to use Instabug's Android SDK
body: Usage -------- It's as easy as "Get ready, Get set, Go". 1. Adding Instabug to your dependencies (Getting ready) Grab it via Gradle: ```groovy compile 'com.instabug.library:instabugsupport:1.7' ``` or via Maven: (if you're that kind of person :bowtie:) ```xml com.instabug.library instabugsupport 1.7 ``` 1. Initialising Instabug (Getting set) In your `Application` class add the following: ``` @Override public void onCreate() { super.onCreate(); // ... Instabug .initialize(this, "") .setInvocationEvent(Instabug.IBGInvocationEvent.IBGInvocationEventShake); // ... } ``` 1. Go! For modifications and FAQs check the [wiki][wiki] License ======= Copyright 2012 Instabug, Inc.
